Title: Storm-y Weather
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Lauren Morelli, Molly Smith Metzler (executive story editor), Rebecca Angelo (staff writer), Lauren Schuker Blum (staff writer), Anthony Natoli (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: As chaos descends on Litchfield three days into the riot, the inmates wonder what the future holds and seek solace in loved ones.
